text.section: There is an Office of the Long-Term Care Ombudsman in the Department.

section.section: Unless the Secretary is subject to a conflict of interest that cannot be removed, the Secretary shall select a State Long-Term Care Ombudsman.

If the Secretary is subject to a conflict of interest that cannot be removed, the Secretary shall designate another individual, who is not subject to a conflict of interest, to select the State Long-Term Care Ombudsman.
